text: The Painted Woman is a 1932 American thriller movie directed by John G. Blystone and starring Spencer Tracy, Peggy Shannon, Irving Pichel, Raul Roulien, Murray Kinnell. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1932 movies Category:1930s thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John G. Blystone
title: The Painted Woman
